sentence.Network_en: Semicircular seating arrangements are ideal for comfort, interaction and line of sight.
sentence.Network_cn: 半圆形的座位安排对于参与者的互动、视线和舒适度都是十分理想的.

sentence.Network_en: It is usually a semicircular wheaten food with stuffing.
sentence.Network_cn: 它通常是有馅的半圆形的麦制食品.

sentence.Network_en: The semicircular jiao zi was about five centimeters long.
sentence.Network_cn: 那半圆的饺子大概五公分长.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 数学词汇英语翻译(S-Z) ... semicircle 半圆 semicircular 半圆的 semicircular domain 半圆域.
整形专业英语词汇-眼睑重建 - 豆丁网 ... requisite 必要的 semicircular 半圆形的，半环 myocutaneous 肌肉皮肤的.
生物专业英语词汇——词素（词根）部分-考试-生物谷 ... semicanal 半管， semicircular 半环形的， semicoma 半昏迷，轻昏迷.
embryo spirally twisted or semicircular to horseshoe - shaped., 胚螺旋扭曲或者半圆到马蹄形.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin semicircularis (see semicircle)

entry.def: Something that is semi-circular has the shape of half a circle.
